main_definition: In a general sense, 'ahead' refers to being in front or leading position; it can also indicate progression towards future events or goals.

meanings_and_examples.example: The red car is ahead of the blue one on the highway.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Mentally prepared or ready to face future events or challenges
meanings_and_examples.example: I'm feeling ahead for my final exams because I've been studying hard.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Progressing in terms of time, progress, or advancement towards a goal or objective
meanings_and_examples.example: Our team is making great strides and we are definitely ahead of schedule with the project completion date.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In sports, being positioned closer to the finish line in a race
meanings_and_examples.example: The marathon runner who started first was far ahead of the others at the halfway point.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To anticipate or expect something before it happens
meanings_and_examples.example: I'm feeling ahead because I know my application will be accepted due to its strong content.
